attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877239377. The 8th generation of a South African classic. Introducing the all-new Honda Ballade . The poise and elegance you’ve come to expect. The technology and reliability you have a right to demand with larger dimensions, superior quality, new technology and a sporty new exterior. This fuel efficient vehicle comes with a 5 year / 200000km warranty, 4 year / 60000km service plan and 3 year roadside assistance.

This vehicle comes fitted with Bluetooth, Keyless start, Fog lights and many more.

Book your test drive today!
